initialize(address).details: can only be called once during the life cycle of the contract

params._owner: address of owner who can change global variables

isWithinLimits(uint256,(uint256,uint256).details: min or max = 0 is considered as no limit set

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow limit in lowest units of USDC
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow limit in lowest units of USDC

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow rate
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow rate

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the collection period
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the collection period

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the default grace period
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the default grace period

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the duration
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the duration

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the penalty rate in grace period
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the penalty rate in grace period

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the ideal collateral ratio
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the ideal collateral ratio

PRICE_ORACLE().notice: stores the address of price oracle contract*

isWithinLimits(uint256,(uint256,uint256).notice: invoked to check if credit lines parameters are within thresholds

updateBorrowAmountUSDCLimits(uint256,uin.notice: used to update the thresholds of the borrow limit of the pooled credit line

updateBorrowRateLimits(uint256,uint256).notice: used to update the thresholds of the borrow rate of the pooled credit line

updateCollectionPeriodLimits(uint256,uin.notice: used to update the thresholds of the collection period of the pooled credit line

updateDefaultGracePeriodLimits(uint256,u.notice: used to update the thresholds of the grace period after which pooled credit line defaults

updateDurationLimits(uint256,uint256).notice: used to update the thresholds of the duration of the pooled credit line

updateGracePenaltyRateLimits(uint256,uin.notice: used to update the thresholds of the penalty rate in grace period of the pooled credit line

updateIdealCollateralRatioLimits(uint256.notice: used to update the thresholds of the ideal collateral ratio of the pooled credit line

documentation.text: @notice stores the address of price oracle contract*
